references.paper_title: Communication-efficient learning of deep networks from decentralized data
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of federated learning, introducing communication-efficient techniques that are crucial for practical applications.
This work directly addresses the challenge of non-IID data in federated learning by introducing a distributionally robust approach, which is the core focus of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Non-smooth weakly-convex finite-sum coupled compositional optimization
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for solving the non-smooth optimization problems that arise in the FGDRO-CVaR algorithm.
This work introduces federated adaptive optimization methods, which are extended in the current paper to develop the FGDRO-KL-Adam algorithm.

references.paper_title: Federated optimization: Distributed machine learning for on-device intelligence
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in federated learning, providing the context and motivation for the research in communication-efficient federated learning.
